\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, \w have|strong="G3588"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w read|strong="G0314"\w* \w that|strong="G3004"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w spoken|strong="G3004"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w a|strong="G1520"\w* doctor \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w law|strong="G3544"\w*, \w asking|strong="G1905"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, tempting \w him|strong="G0846"\w*:

\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w greatest|strong="G3173"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w commandment|strong="G1785"\w*.
